name: Rainbow Ghost Party
description:
Epileptic Seizure Warning: A very small percentage of people may experience a seizure when exposed to the flashing lights or patterns that appear in this game.

This is Rainbow Ghost Party. 

Shoot the ghosts for the highest score! 

  •  ENTER = start new game
  • Arrow keys = aim
  • W,A,S,D = aim
  • SPACE  = shoot
